statement.p: Out of the last 43 days, it rained 14 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{14}}{{43}}={0.32558139534884}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.32558139534884}={32.558139534884} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 32.56 .
